After analyzing the clues, I've come up with a solution for the logic puzzle:


#############
| Hobby   | Woodworking  | Card-games  | Drawing  | Rock-climbing | Board-games | Sudoku    | Fishing |
|         |               |             |        |         |             |            |         |

Here's how each clue led to the final solution:

1. The person who's hobby is fishing is on the right of the person who's hobby is card-games.
   -> This tells us that Card-games can't be in the last position (since Fishing needs to be to its right).

2. The person who's hobby is drawing is in the middle.
   -> There are 7 positions, so the middle one must be position 4 or 3/4. Since it's more likely to be a single position, I'll assume it's position 4.

3. The person who's hobby is fishing is on the far right.
   -> This confirms that Fishing goes in the last position (7).

4. The person who's hobby is woodworking is on the left of the person who's hobby is card-games.
   -> Woodworking must be to the left of Card-games.

5. The person who's hobby is board-games is on the right of the person who's hobby is rock-climbing.
   -> This pair can go in positions 4-6 or 5-7, but since Drawing occupies position 4, they'll fit better in positions 5 and 6.

6. The person who's hobby is sudoku is on the right of the person who's hobby is board-games.
   -> Sudoku must be to the right of Board-games, which puts it in position 7 if we were considering the 4-6 or 5-7 spots for Board-games and Rock-climbing. However, since Fishing occupies position 7, Sudoku will have to go in a different spot (position 6), forcing Board-games into position 5.

Considering all these clues together led me to this final arrangement:


#############
| Hobby   | Woodworking  | Card-games  | Drawing  | Rock-climbing | Board-games | Sudoku    | Fishing |
|         |               |             |        |         |             |            |         |

#############
| Folk        | d&b  | Ambient | Disco | House | Rock    | Soul  |
#############


Here's how I arrived at the solution:

* Clue 5 states that the fan of d&b is in the middle, so I placed d&b in position 4.
* Clue 1 states that the fan of house is on the right of the fan of rock. This means that House and Rock cannot be in positions 6 or 7 (since there would be no space for the other to be to the left/right). So, I placed Rock in position 6 and House in position 5.
* Clue 3 states that the fan of disco is on the right of the fan of ambient. Since d&b is in position 4, Ambient must be to its left (position 3), and Disco must be to its right (position 5). However, we already placed House in position 5, so I moved Disco to position 4 was not possible. Instead, I moved Ambient to position 2 and Disco to position 6 didn't work either since rock is there, then I tried putting disco on the left of rock that also didn't fit with house on right of rock, however it did work when I placed ambient in column 3
* Clue 4 states that the fan of folk is on the left of the fan of d&b. Since d&b is in position 2 doesn't work because then ambient can not be to its left so we move the 2 positions one to right, Folk must be in position 1.
* The only remaining genre is Soul, which I placed in position 7.

So, the final solution table is:


#############
| Folk        | d&b  | Ambient | Disco | House | Rock    | Soul  |
#############
